Published January 13 2015

A Review of the GORUCK GR2

A Review of the GORUCK GR2 — This GORUCK GR2 review, by Alvaro Serrano, is sublime. I may just start forwarding my review of the (similar) GORUCK GR1, because Mr. Serrano’s version eclipses mine, in all possible ways. After reading through this piece twice, I’m not sure which is better: the photography, the writing style, or the way the Tools and Toys design handles long-form content.

Enjoy your day.
